name: Bridge Constructor Studio
summary:
Get Building Today 

Bridge Constructor Studio is a must-have for fans of engineering puzzles and creative sandbox games. Whether you're designing a sturdy structural masterpiece or experimenting with wild and weird works, puzzle the possibilities are endless!  

Key Features 

Brain-Teasing 70-Puzzle Campaign: Test your construction expertise with dozens of distinct bridge-building puzzles across varied biomes. Seven different vehicles and multiple construction materials (wood, steel, cables, concrete...
